priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Arm Null Reason Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C142179

self.title: CDISC SDTM Arm Null Reason Response Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the reason for why an arm and/or an actual arm is null.
name: Arm Null Reason
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Arm Null Reason Response Terminology

terms.definition: The subject, who met eligibility criteria, was assigned to an arm but was not treated. (NCI)
terms.preferredTerm: Subject Assigned to Arm But Not Treated

terms.definition: The subject, who met eligibility criteria, was not assigned to an arm and was not treated. (NCI)
The potential subject who does not meet eligibility criteria during the screening period.
The subject, who met eligibility criteria, was assigned to an arm but received treatment not associated with any of the planned arms.
